CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Needs Analysis stage positioned above or below the Lead Captured stage?
SRP.A: The Needs Analysis stage is positioned {below} the Lead Captured stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {linear} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Lead Captured?
VE.A: The value of stage Lead Captured is {1584}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Needs Analysis?
VE.A: The value of stage Needs Analysis is {1170}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Lead Captured, with a value of {1584}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Client Onboarded, with a value of {292}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Contract Signed to stage Client Onboarded?
SC.A: Decreased by {192} Clients from stage Contract Signed to stage Client Onboarded.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Lead Captured to stage Initial Contact?
SC.A: Decreased by {209} Clients from stage Lead Captured to stage Initial Contact.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Proposal Sent to stage Negotiation?
SC.A: Decreased by {217} Clients from stage Proposal Sent to stage Negotiation.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 1272? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Lead Captured} stage has {1584}, the {Initial Contact} stage has {1375}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 830? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Negotiation} stage has {722}, the {Contract Signed} stage has {484}, the {Client Onboarded} stage has {292}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 603 and 1054? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Proposal Sent} stage has {939}, the {Negotiation} stage has {722}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Needs Analysis to Proposal Sent, or from stage Initial Contact to Needs Analysis?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Needs Analysis} to {Proposal Sent} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Negotiation to Contract Signed, from stage Needs Analysis to Proposal Sent, or from stage Lead Captured to Initial Contact?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Negotiation} to stage {Contract Signed} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Negotiation} and {Contract Signed} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Contract Signed} and {Client Onboarded} stages.
